doc.name: mobileAllowedOrientations
doc.summary: Returns a list of the currently allowed orientations.

description.overview: Use the mobileAllowedOrientations function to find a list of the currently allowed orientations.
description.value:
The mobileAllowedOrientations function returns a comma delimited list including at least one of:
* portrait
* portrait upside down
* landscape left
* landscape right
description.comments:
The mobileAllowedOrientations function returns a comma delimited list of the orientations the application supports.
Due to the limitation of the Android operating system, landscape left and portrait upside-down are only supported on Android 2.3 and later.
